medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Twelve Scenes of Tokyo: Shinobazu Pond

description: two women in kimono (one holding umbrella in PR hand) stroll close together at LR in front of a pond; in middle ground, an orange pagoda sits atop a white base; blossoming trees and shrine buildings in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
